title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions: Get ready to elevate your yoga and exercise experience with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat in a stunning teal color. This 72" x 24" mat is 2/5 inch thick, providing extra cushioning and support for all your workouts. Made from NBR foam, it's perfect for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises. The soft cushioning and easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap make it convenient to take with you wherever you go. Say goodbye to uncomfortable workouts and hello to a new level of comfort and style with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat.

Get the ultimate support and comfort for your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Made with extra-thick NBR foam, this mat provides soft cushioning to protect your joints and enhance your practice. The easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap makes it convenient to take your mat with you wherever you go. Measuring 72 inches in length, 24 inches in width, and 2/5 inch thick, this teal-colored mat is the perfect addition to your fitness routine. Invest in your well-being and elevate your workouts with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat.
